item.title: âš ï¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ After a record autumn of investments, international investors have begun to cash in on large te...
item.description: âš ï¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ After a record autumn of investments, international investors have begun to cash in on large tech stocks this December. Since the start of the month, there has been a net outflow of $1.6 billion, marking the highest figure of the year. Concerns about a potential "AI bubble" and the timeline for future Federal Reserve rate cuts are significant factors. Wall Street strategists recommend focusing on less trendy sectors such as health care, industrials, and energy. For further details, check out BofA|EPFR and Bloomberg. Discover more at max.

item.title: âš ï¸ğŸ’£ Recent transmissions from the radio station UVB-76, often referred to as the "Doomsday Radio Sta...
item.description: âš ï¸ğŸ’£ Recent transmissions from the radio station UVB-76, often referred to as the "Doomsday Radio Station," have sparked concerns in the West. In the last week, it has sent out as many as 15 enigmatic messages, fueling anxieties about a possible third world war. Phrases such as "pepper shaker," "re-hiring," and "outlawed" were among those broadcast. Typically, the frequency of these coded communications tends to rise during times of global crises, which has heightened fears of conflict this week, according to the British tabloid Express. max

item.description: ğŸ—“Today, EU representatives are expected to approve a 20th sanctions package against Russia. Ukrainian President Zelensky is scheduled to meet with EU and NATO leaders in Berlin, while Witkoff and Kushner continue discussions with the Ukrainian team. Significant economic updates include China's industrial production figures, the Eurozone's industrial output, Canada's consumer inflation rates, and the US NY Empire State Manufacturing Index. Additionally, the CBOE will introduce perpetual futures trading for BTC and ETH, and Trump may consider relaxing regulations for the cannabis industry. Norilsk Nickel is set to publish a report on commodity markets.
